properties.areaDesc: Mexico Bay NY to the St. Lawrence River
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 12 at 12:52AM EST until January 12 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 25 knots and waves 7 to 10 feet.

* WHERE...The nearshore waters of Lake Ontario from Mexico Bay
to the Saint Lawrence River.

* WHEN...Until 7 PM EST Sunday evening.

* IMPACTS...Winds and/or waves will cause hazardous conditions
that could capsize or damage small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... ...GALE WARNING IS CANCELLED
